sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS0100 ( DPOB_CD , DPOB_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , TPLVL_DPOB_CD , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , DPOB_ZPCD , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR , DPOB_PHN_NUM , DPOB_FAX_NUM , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , SYS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NUM , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NM , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dpobNm# , #degtrResnRegnNum# , #tplvlDpobCd# , #degtrNm# , #busoprRgstnNum# , #corpRgstnNum# , #corpDivCd# , #dpobZpcd# , #dpobFndtnAddr# , #dpobDtlPatrAddr# , #dpobPhnNum# , #dpobFaxNum# , #dpobSealWrdNm# , #dpobSealRftaNm# , #dpobSealFlNm# , #dpobFndtnUseYn# , #hlthInsrSym# , #natPennSym# , #umytInsrSym# , #sysDivCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# , #retryCllnDebrDivCd# , #insurPrvaffAgcyIstutNum# , #insurPrvaffAgcyIstutNm# , #hlthInsrOfceSym# , #idtlAccdtInsurSym# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS0100 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , DPOB_NM=#dpobNm# , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM=#degtrResnRegnNum# , TPLVL_DPOB_CD=#tplvlDpobCd# , DEGTR_NM=#degtrNm# , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM=#busoprRgstnNum# , CORP_RGSTN_NUM=#corpRgstnNum# , CORP_DIV_CD=#corpDivCd# , DPOB_ZPCD=#dpobZpcd# , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR=#dpobFndtnAddr# , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR=#dpobDtlPatrAddr# , DPOB_PHN_NUM=#dpobPhnNum# , DPOB_FAX_NUM=#dpobFaxNum# , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM=#dpobSealWrdNm# , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM=#dpobSealRftaNm# , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM=#dpobSealFlNm# , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN=#dpobFndtnUseYn# , HLTH_INSR_SYM=#hlthInsrSym# , NAT_PENN_SYM=#natPennSym# , UMYT_INSR_SYM=#umytInsrSym# , SYS_DIV_CD=#sysDivCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD=#retryCllnDebrDivCd# , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NUM=#insurPrvaffAgcyIstutNum# , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NM=#insurPrvaffAgcyIstutNm# , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM=#hlthInsrOfceSym# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM=#idtlAccdtInsurSym#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , DPOB_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , TPLVL_DPOB_CD , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , DPOB_ZPCD , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR , DPOB_PHN_NUM , DPOB_FAX_NUM , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , SYS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NUM , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NM , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM FROM BASS0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , DPOB_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , TPLVL_DPOB_CD , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , DPOB_ZPCD , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR , DPOB_PHN_NUM , DPOB_FAX_NUM , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , SYS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NUM , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NM , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM FROM BASS0100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DPOB_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DPOB_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
